title: FianceeStart
body:
Veronica Baguette: I am Dill's Fiancee.
Veronica Baguette: I can't believe what happened!
Veronica Baguette: It's awful..
[[ Were you on good terms? |goodterms]]
[[ When did you see him last? |when]]

title: goodterms
body:
Veronica Baguette: Yes.. But recently we had an argument.
Veronica Baguette: It wasn't bad enough for me to kill him! I would never do anything like that.
[[ Can you explain further? |talk]]
[[ Thanks. |Bye]]

title: when
body:
Veronica Baguette: I saw Dill a couple hours ago.
[[ Can you explain further? |explain]]

title: ButcherStart
body:
Frank Furter: I can't believe there's been a murder in our store!
Frank Furter: What horror! I really hope you solve it.
[[ What's in your hand? |inhand]]
[[ When did you hear about the murder? |whendidyouhear]]

title: inhand
body:
Frank Furter: In my hand?
It's my trusty cleaver of course!
Frank Furter: Why do you ask?
[[ Can I take a look at it?|takealook]] 
[[ Never mind. |nevermind]]

title: whendidyouhear
body:
Frank Furter: Fiancee told me around 10 minutes ago.
[[ For the investigation purposes, what shoe size are you? |butcherfeet]]

title: takealook
body:
There is a faint smear of blood on the knife.
[[ Take sample of blood. |takesample]]
[[ Give back. |giveback]]

title: nevermind
body: Frank Furter:I hope you find the killer!

title: takesample
body: The blood on the cleaver matches the victim's blood.

title: giveback
body: Frank Furter: See you around!

title: talk
body:
Veronica Baguette:I bet it was Rick, he was talking with his dad about the will.
He wants Dill's inheritance!

title: Bye
body: Veronica Baguette: I hope you find the killer.

title: explain
body:
Veronica Baguette: But his son Rick, had a chat with him after me.
[[ Rick? |rickq]]
[[ Are you close with Rick? |rick question]]

title: rick question
body:
Veronica Baguette: We never got along, there was disagreements with Dill's will.
[[ For the investigation purposes, what shoe size are you? |feet]]
[[ Okay, thank you for your cooperation. |thank you]]

title: rickq
body:
Veronica Baguette: Rick is Dill's son. We never got along.
[[ For the investigation purposes, what shoe size are you? |feet]]
[[ Okay, thank you for your cooperation. |thank you]]

title: feet
body: Veronica Baguette: I am a size 5.

title: thank you
body: Veronica Baguette: Please find the killer!

title: butcherfeet
body:
Frank Furter: I am a size 9.
[[ Thank you for your help. |goodbye]]

title: goodbye
body: Frank Furter: Please find the killer!

title: Tim
body:
Tim Scrubs: The CEO?! What happened? He was a good guy.
[[ When did you see him last? |last]]

title: last
body:
Tim Scrubs: It must be Benjamin! I overheard an argument between the CEO and Benjamin about their bean business.
[[ Did you know any important details? |further]]
[[ Thank you for your help |cya]]

title: further
body:
Tim Scrubs: It seems the CEO owed Benjamin a lot of money.
[[ Is this your mop? |mop]]

title: cya
body: Tim Scrubs: I hope you find them!

title: mop
body:
Tim Scrubs: Oh thank you, I couldn't find it, it went missing a couple hours ago.
[[ For the investigation purposes, what size feet are you? |shoe]]

title: shoe
body:
Tim Scrubs: I am a size 7.
[[ Thank you for your help. |cya]]

title: Cereal
body:
Cereal Killer: Hello, I was just selling cereal, but I stumbled across a dead body!
I swear I don't know anything.
[[ For the investigation purposes, what shoe size are you? |shoes]]
[[ Elaborate further |more]]

title: shoes
body:
Cereal Killer: I am a size 7.
[[ Thank you for your cooperation. |bai]]

title: more
body:
Cereal Killer: I'm just here to sell cereal!
[[ Thank you for your help. |bai]]

title: bai
body: Cereal Killer: I hope you find the killer quickly.

title: Rick
body:
Rick Pickleson: Hi, I am a cashier here.
[[ Did you hear about the murder of PriceCo's CEO?|CEO]]

title: CEO
body:
Rick Pickleson: What?!? MY DAD?
[[ He's your dad? |dad]]

title: dad
body:
Rick Pickleson:I bet it was Veronica, she wants all my dad's money!
[[ And why is there a will right by you? |will]]
[[ When did you see him last? |see]]

title: will
body:
Rick Pickleson: The will.. we had a chat about it earlier.
[[ For the investigation purposes, what size feet are you? |rickfeet]]

title: see
body:
Rick Pickleson: I chatted with my dad about the will and he isn't giving me anything.
[[ For the investigation purposes, what size feet are you? |rickfeet]]

title: rickfeet
body:
Rick Pickleson: I am a size 9.
[[ Thank you for your cooperation. |coop]]

title: coop
body: Rick Pickleson: Hopefully you find whoever killed my dad.

title: Benjamin
body:
Benjamin B. Beans: Hi, I am the CEO's ex-busines partner.
[[ How did you know the victim? |bp]]

title: bp
body:
Benjamin B. Beans: Me and Dill go way back. We were business partners.
[[ Elaborate further |e]]
[[ When did you see him last? |l]]

title: e
body:
Benjamin B. Beans: Uh.. we had a baked bean business together. I lent him Â£100,000 and then the business failed.
[[ Does he still owe you money? |money]]

title: l
body:
Benjamin B. Beans: I came into the store because I needed to talk to him.
[[ Speak about what? |speakk]]

title: money
body:
Benjamin B. Beans: Erm.. Well.. Maybe..
[[ For the investigation purposes, what size feet are you? |bpshoe]]

title: speakk
body:
Benjamin B. Beans: Erm.. just bean business stuff..
[[ For the investigation purposes, what size feet are you? |bpshoe]]

title: bpshoe
body:
Benjamin B. Beans: I am a size 9..
[[ Thank you for your cooperation. |tyvm]]

title: tyvm
body: Benjamin B. Beans: Yeah.. Cya..
